\t\tTinker Controller is an open-source Game Controller App that allows you to use an Xbox/Ps4/Joycon or any controller that works with your phone to effortlessly control most micro-controllers such as Arduino/Esp8266/Raspberry Pi over WiFi, bluetooth, or USB.\n\n
\t\tClick on the Cat, if you want to find latest updates or submit an issue. If you want to donate then click on the donate button.
This app does not use location information, but scanning for Bluetooth LE devices requires this permission
